document_data.name: Peldar Armsmith
document_data.mainbody: '''Peldar Armsmith''' was the [[Cloakmaster]] of [[Karlaggar]], one of the eight districts of [[Zazesspur]], for the [[Shadow Thieves]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.History: Peldar was a blacksmith before becoming a well-known arms and armors merchant. Entering into the Shadow Thieves, he was chosen as one of the eight Cloakmasters of Zazesspur.
document_data.Personality: Peldar had a foul temper. He had decent relationships with the other Cloakmasters as long as they respected his own sphere of influence.
